column1: If the configuration in the admin is milestone X, the total milestones reported will be X+1. For example, in the screenshot, there are 3 milestones configured, but we treat it as 4.

Event description: Reported when reward granted (resource) to the user, will be reported whenever a prize is granted
Property description: Source of resource
race event_id
in case the resource gained from collectable items, the collectable item name
event xp collected

Event description: Reported when reward collected for user by reward system
Property description: unique id that will be identical for all chest reward flow
Unique reward ID linking between reward granted, created and collected
[name]_[segment index]_[start date=local time (UTC)]
Source of reward created
Number of diamonds granted
Number of smileys granted
Number of energy units granted
Number of event energy units granted
vanity tokens value
One parameter for each item granted (tool, toolbox, crate, joker, etc.)
Corresponding amount of each item
JSON listing of all items and resources rewarded
The number of distinct rewards collected
